description: This Dart source file provides a static mock data setup for a mobile app, including categories, books, orders, wishlist entries, and miscellaneous data for offline mode rendering in a Flutter application.
external_methods: Book(id: String, title: String, author: String, coverUrl: String, description: String, priceCents: int, oldPriceCents: int?, rating: double, categorySlug: String)
OrderModel(id: String, book: Book, quantity: int, status: String, placedAt: DateTime)

classes.name: MockData
classes.description: A utility class providing static mock data such as categories, books, orders, wishlist, and methods for data retrieval, used when the app operates in offline mode for rendering purposes.

methods.name: MockData._
methods.description: Private constructor to prevent instantiation of the static class.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: A list of predefined categories used as mock data.

methods.name: books
methods.description: A list of generated mock books, each associated with a category and with mock attributes such as price, rating, and description.

methods.name: sampleBooks
methods.description: A getter providing access to the mock books list, intended for UI components.

methods.name: findBook
methods.description: Fetches a book by its ID, defaulting to the first book if not found.

methods.name: getBooks
methods.description: Returns a filtered list of books by optional category slug and price range.

methods.name: orders
methods.description: A list of mock order models referencing books with varying statuses.

methods.name: wishlist
methods.description: A list of mock wishlist entries referencing books.

methods.name: newArrivals
methods.description: Randomly selects a set of books to represent new arrivals, using a fixed seed random generator.
